posts.content:
www.grill-n-chill.co.uk

Back at the Hop Farm again for the 4th year running.

Time to mix it with a few other marks from hot rods to muscle cars with the maddest custom rides thrown in the mix!

The CoolFlo boys and girls with be doing there old Skool BMX show m shine and we've secured their half pipe again this year for sk8 and bike rides alike.

If you've never been before this is a family friendly event with the emphasis on 'chill'. It's NOT a hardcore, party all night type of show. Leave your attitudes at the gate and meet friends new and old.

Under 16's are free, full adult weekend camping tickets including three days show entry are priced from £15-£20 MAX!!!

Visit our website (above) or search for us on Facebook.

Thanks in advance, Anton

Hello is anyone interested in having a SSVC camping area for this? We would need at least 10 of us prebooked.
Cheers
Paul

Guess not Paul!

See you next weekend regardless.
